title: Accounting Associate
job_overview:
We are a US Company looking for an enthusiastic person to join our team as an Accounting Associate. The role will be expanded over time based on the skills of the selected candidate, and will provide extensive experience in the solar and renewable energy industries.

The ideal candidate will have:

· Understanding and experience with US tax accounting principles or relevant education

· Experience using technology to improve and streamline work processes

· Ability to use web based systems (CRM, task management, document management)

· Exceptional attention to detail

· Proficient at solving problems and finding solutions using any available resource

· Passionate about digital marketing



The successful candidate will be expected to:

· Utilize Quickbooks Advanced Online and be able to actively configure software to support business processes

· Perform bookkeeping, basic project account management

· Manage staff timesheets, leave accruals, contractor payments

· Prepare and manage operational budgets for the business including overheads and payroll

· Manage third-party contractor invoices and expenses / change orders

· Developing business cashflow forecasts using Quickbooks and project models

· Prepare financial models and information to support tender applications

· Our business is strongly supported by technology, and we are looking for people who are adept at working remotely.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Economics, or Finance or equivalent experience
0 - 3 years' financial analysis and modeling experience
Advanced knowledge of Excel\
